text: Gadhra is a census town in Purbi Singhbhum district in the state of Jharkhand, India. ==Demographics== India census, Gadhra had a population of 15,742. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Gadhra has an average literacy rate of 65%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 75%, and female literacy is 55%. In Gadhra, 14% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in East Singhbhum district
title: Gadhra
